archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Electronic Medical Records
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Electronic Medical Records (EMR)
• Purpose: Digital version of paper charts within a single healthcare organization
• Core Functions:
o Real-time clinical data entry and documentation o Progress notes and clinical observations o Treatment plans and care protocols o Digital prescriptions and medication orders o Clinical alerts and reminders
• Data Scope: Organization-specific, encounter-based records • Workflow Integration: Physician order entry, nursing documentation, clinical pathways • Decision Support: Drug interaction checking, allergy alerts, evidence-based guidelines • Benefits: Improved documentation, enhanced patient safety, clinical efficiency
